name: Catalyst
description: Catalyst is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its forest green box and soldier-like appearance, Catalyst is always ready for action. Its arms and legs form a strong and sturdy structure, with its hands hanging down like a soldier at ease. The screen on Catalyst's front is shaped like a cat, giving it a playful and intriguing touch. As an oscilloscope robot, Catalyst excels in analyzing and interpreting electrical signals, making it a valuable asset in any technological endeavor.
